depositConfirmed: Your deposit with amount if {{amount}} BTC is now confirmed and added to your balance
depositPending: Your deposit with amount of {{amount}} BTC is now pending
withdrawPending: Withdraw transaction with amount of {{amount}} BTC is now pending
withdrawConfirmed: Withdraw transaction with amount of {{amount}} BTC is now confirmed
withdrawRejected: Withdraw transaction with amount of {{amount}} BTC is now rejected and amount credited back to your balance
withdrawSubmitted: Withdraw transaction with amount of {{amount}} BTC is submitted to the network
